name: Amir Choshov
title: QA Engineer | Web & Mobile Automation
summary: Detail-oriented QA Engineer with 7+ years in web and mobile application testing, specializing in RBAC validation, end-to-end automation, and risk-based testing. Skilled in building test strategies integrating manual and automated coverage to accelerate release cycles. Experienced in collaborating with cross-functional teams to ensure secure, stable, and high-quality deployments in Agile environments. Passionate about AI-assisted testing, CI/CD optimization, and continuous quality improvements.

projects.title: Senior QA Engineer (Web & Mobile)
achievements: Designed and executed test plans for RBAC and authentication workflows across multi-role healthcare platforms.
Validated authorization logic, token-based sessions, and DocuSign e-signature integrations.
Conducted security-adjacent regression tests ensuring HIPAA compliance and eliminating privilege escalation paths.
Introduced risk-based prioritization, reducing high-severity bug escape rates by 35%.
Contributed to Playwright automation pipelines, integrating E2E and regression coverage into CI/CD.

projects.title: QA Engineer
achievements: Performed cross-browser functional testing across Chrome, Safari, Firefox, and Edge.
Developed detailed test documentation to streamline triage and root cause analysis.
Supported Cypress UI automation for regression cycles, reducing manual retests by 40%.

projects.title: QA Tester
achievements: Executed smoke and exploratory testing on iOS and Android clients.
Collaborated with developers to debug UI/UX inconsistencies and improved issue resolution speed by 20%.

projects.name: AI-Powered QA Assistant (Local Multi-Agent System)
projects.description: Developed a chain-prompt testing assistant with multiple QA agents using Ollama and small models (Phi/Mistral) for test generation and feature clarification.
projects.impact: Demonstrated expertise in AI-driven QA pipelines and lightweight on-device model integration.

projects.name: Full-Stack QA Framework (Playwright + k6 + TypeScript)
projects.description: Created a modular automation harness for API/UI testing and performance probes.
projects.impact: Reduced flakiness by 70% and CI runtime by 55%.

strengths: Analytical, detail-oriented, and strong at identifying edge cases early.
Process-driven and passionate about refining QA frameworks and test design.
